name: Navin Rosemary
description: Dried Rosemary. Rosemary is used as a seasoning in a variety of dishes, such as soups, casseroles, salads and stews. Use rosemary with chicken and other poultry, game, lamb, pork, steaks and fish, especially oily fish. It also goes well with grains, mushrooms, onions, peas, potatoes and spinach. [Source: www.thespruceeats.com] *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
